rukus.text: Sε anka Nyankopͻn de adasamma bͻne retwe wͻn aso a, anka Onnyae abͻdeε baako mpo wͻ asaase so, na mmom Ɔbͻ wͻn to hͻ dema εberε a yahyε no. Sε wͻn berε no so a, εnka akyi dͻnhwere koraa na εnkͻ anim nso
Deε wͻn ara wͻ’mpε no na wͻ’de ma Nyankopͻn, wͻ’de wͻn kεterεma ka atorͻsεm sε: “Nneεma papa no yε wͻn dea“. Akyinnyeε biara nni ho sε, Ogya no bεyε wͻn dea, na yεbεgya wͻn wͻ mu korakorakora

“Medͻ Nyame sε, ampa Yε’somaa asomafoͻ kͻͻ aman aman a wͻ’dii w’anim kan no so. Nanso ͻbonsam maa wͻn dwumadie yεε wͻn aniso fε. Enti ͻne wͻn kyitaafoͻ nnε (da yi). Wͻn wͻ asotwee a εyε ya papaapa (Daakye) “
(Nkͻmhyεni), Deԑ nti Ye’sianee Nwoma no maa woᴐ nesε wode bεkyerεkyerε deε wͻ’nnya wͻn ho nteaseε wͻ ho no mu akyerε wͻn, na εyε kwankyerε ne ahummͻborͻ ma amanfoͻ a wͻ’gye die no
Onyankopͻn siane nsuo fri soro de benyane asaase wͻ newuo akyi. Nokorε sε nsεnkyerεnee wͻ woi mu dema amanfoͻ a wͻ’tie (Onyankopͻn asεm no)
